description:
Allows a calling app to continue a call which was started in another app. An example is a video calling app that wants to continue a voice call on the user's mobile network.
When the handover of a call from one app to another takes place, there are two devices which are involved in the handover; the initiating and receiving devices. The initiating device is where the request to handover the call was started, and the receiving device is where the handover request is confirmed by the other party.
This permission protects access to the TelecomManager.acceptHandover(Uri, int, PhoneAccountHandle) which the receiving side of the handover uses to accept a handover.
name: 接受切换
trans: 允许呼叫应用程序继续在其他应用程序中启动的呼叫。例如，视频通话应用程序希望在用户的移动网络上继续语音通话。

description: Allows an app to access location in the background. If you are requesting this, you should also request ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION. Requesting this by itself is not sufficient to give you location access.
name: 访问背景位置
trans: 允许应用程序在后台访问位置。如果您请求这样做，您还应该请求访问\u fine \u位置。单独请求这一点不足以为您提供位置访问权限。

description: Allows read/write access to the "properties" table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 访问签入属性
trans: 允许对签入数据库中的“属性”表进行读/写访问，以更改上载的值。

description: Allows an app to access approximate location. Alternatively, you might want ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.
name: 粗略定位
trans: 允许应用程序访问大致位置。或者，您可能需要访问“精细”位置。

description: Allows an app to access precise location. Alternatively, you might want ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.
name: 精确定位
trans: 允许应用程序访问精确的位置。或者，您可能需要访问“粗糙”位置。

description: Allows an application to access extra location provider commands.
name: 允许应用程序访问额外的位置提供命令
trans: 允许应用程序访问额外的位置提供程序命令。

description: Allows an application to access any geographic locations persisted in the user's shared collection.
name: 访问媒体位置
trans: 允许应用程序访问用户共享集合中保留的任何地理位置。

description: Allows applications to access information about networks.
name: 获取网络状态权限
trans: 允许应用程序访问有关网络的信息。

description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy. This permission is not supported on managed profiles.
name: 对希望访问通知政策的应用程序的标记许可
trans: 要访问通知策略的应用程序的标记权限。托管配置文件不支持此权限。

description: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks.
name: WIFI网络状态权限
trans: 允许应用程序访问有关Wi-Fi网络的信息。

description: Allows applications to call into AccountAuthenticators.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 客户经理
trans: 允许应用程序调用AccountAuthenticator。

description: Allows an application to recognize physical activity.
name: 活动识别
trans: 允许应用程序识别物理活动。

description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.
name: 添加语音邮件
trans: 允许应用程序向系统中添加语音邮件。

description: Allows the app to answer an incoming phone call.
name: 接听电话
trans: 允许应用程序接听来电。

description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics
name: 电池统计
trans: 允许应用程序收集电池统计信息

description: Must be required by an AccessibilityService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定辅助功能服务
trans: 必须由AccessibilityService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Allows an application to tell the AppWidget service which application can access AppWidget's data. The normal user flow is that a user picks an AppWidget to go into a particular host, thereby giving that host application access to the private data from the AppWidget app. An application that has this permission should honor that contract.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 绑定AppWIDGET
trans: 允许应用程序告诉AppWidget服务哪个应用程序可以访问AppWidget的数据。正常的用户流是用户选择一个AppWidget进入一个特定的主机，从而使主机应用程序能够访问来自AppWidget应用程序的私有数据。有此权限的申请应遵守该合同。

description: Must be required by a AutofillService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定自动填充服务
trans: 必须是AutoFillService所要求的，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a CallRedirectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定呼叫重定向服务
trans: 必须是CallRedirectionService所必需的，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: A subclass of CarrierMessagingClientService must be protected with this permission.
name: 绑定运营商消息客户端服务
trans: 必须使用此权限保护CarrierMessagingClientService的子类。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 23.
Use BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES instead
name: 绑定运营商消息服务
trans: 此常量在API级别23中已被弃用。

description: The system process that is allowed to bind to services in carrier apps will have this permission. Carrier apps should use this permission to protect their services that only the system is allowed to bind to.
name: 绑定运营商服务
trans: 允许绑定到运营商应用程序中的服务的系统进程将具有此权限。运营商应用程序应使用此权限保护其仅允许系统绑定的服务。

description: Must be required by a ChooserTargetService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定选择器目标服务
trans: 必须由ChooseTargetService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a ConditionProviderService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定条件提供程序服务
trans: 必须由ConditionProviderService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by device administration receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.
name: 绑定设备管理
trans: 必须由设备管理接收器要求，以确保只有系统可以与之交互。

description: Must be required by an DreamService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定梦想服务
trans: 必须是DreamService所要求的，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a InCallService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定incall服务
trans: 必须由incallservice要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by an InputMethodService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定输入方法
trans: 必须由InputMethodService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by an MidiDeviceService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定MIDI设备服务
trans: 必须由MidiDeviceService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a HostApduService or OffHostApduService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定NFC服务
trans: 必须由HostapDuService或OffHostapDuService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by an NotificationListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定通知侦听器服务
trans: 必须由NotificationListenerService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a PrintService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 装订打印服务
trans: 必须由printservice要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description:
Allows an application to bind to third party quick settings tiles.
Should only be requested by the System, should be required by TileService declarations.
name: 绑定快速设置平铺
trans: 允许应用程序绑定到第三方快速设置块。

description: Must be required by a RemoteViewsService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定远程视图
trans: 必须由远程视图服务要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到该服务。

description: Must be required by a CallScreeningService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定筛选服务
trans: 必须由CallScreeningService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a ConnectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定电信连接服务
trans: 必须是ConnectionService所要求的，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a TextService (e.g. SpellCheckerService) to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定文本服务
trans: 必须由TextService（如SpellCheckerService）要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a TvInputService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定电视输入
trans: 必须由TvInputService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a link VisualVoicemailService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定可视语音邮件服务
trans: 必须由链接VisualVoiceMailService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a VoiceInteractionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定语音交互
trans: 必须由VoiceInteractionService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a VpnService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定VPN服务
trans: 必须是vService所要求的，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by an VrListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 绑定VR侦听器服务
trans: 必须由VRListenersService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Must be required by a WallpaperService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: 装订墙纸
trans: 必须由WallpaperService要求，以确保只有系统可以绑定到它。

description: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices.
name: 连接已配对蓝牙权限
trans: 允许应用程序连接到配对的蓝牙设备。

description: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices.
name: 发现和配对蓝牙权限
trans: 允许应用程序发现和配对蓝牙设备。

description: Allows applications to pair bluetooth devices without user interaction, and to allow or disallow phonebook access or message access. This is not available to third party applications.
name: 蓝牙特权
trans: 允许应用程序配对蓝牙设备而无需用户交互，并允许或禁止电话簿访问或消息访问。这对第三方应用程序不可用。

description: Allows an application to access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside his/her body, such as heart rate.
name: 人体传感器
trans: 允许应用程序访问来自传感器的数据，用户使用这些传感器测量他/她的身体内部发生的事情，例如心率。

description: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 广播包已删除
trans: 允许应用程序广播已删除应用程序包的通知。

description: Allows an application to broadcast an SMS receipt notification.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 广播短信
trans: 允许应用程序广播短信息接收通知。

description: Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents. These are broadcasts whose data is held by the system after being finished, so that clients can quickly retrieve that data without having to wait for the next broadcast.
name: 粘性意图广播权限
trans: 允许应用程序广播粘性意图。这些是广播，其数据在完成后由系统保存，因此客户机可以快速检索该数据，而无需等待下一个广播。

description: Allows an application to broadcast a WAP PUSH receipt notification.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 广播WAP推送
trans: 允许应用程序广播WAP推送回执通知。

description: Allows an app which implements the InCallService API to be eligible to be enabled as a calling companion app. This means that the Telecom framework will bind to the app's InCallService implementation when there are calls active. The app can use the InCallService API to view information about calls on the system and control these calls.
name: 呼叫伴侣应用程序
trans: 允许实现incallservice API的应用程序有资格作为调用伴随应用程序启用。这意味着当有活动的调用时，电信框架将绑定到应用程序的incallservice实现。应用程序可以使用incallservice API查看有关系统调用的信息并控制这些调用。

description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call.
name: 打电话
trans: 允许应用程序在不经过拨号程序用户界面的情况下启动电话呼叫，以便用户确认呼叫。

description: Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 呼叫特权
trans: 允许应用程序调用任何电话号码（包括紧急号码），而无需通过拨号程序用户界面让用户确认正在进行的呼叫。

description:
Required to be able to access the camera device.
This will automatically enforce the uses-feature manifest element for all camera features. If you do not require all camera features or can properly operate if a camera is not available, then you must modify your manifest as appropriate in order to install on devices that don't support all camera features.
name: 相机拍照、录像
trans: 需要能够访问摄像机设备。

description: Allows an application to capture audio output. Use the CAPTURE_MEDIA_OUTPUT permission if only the USAGE_UNKNOWN), USAGE_MEDIA) or USAGE_GAME) usages are intended to be captured.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 捕获音频输出
trans: 允许应用程序捕获音频输出。如果只打算捕获使用情况（未知）、使用情况（媒体）或使用情况（游戏），请使用捕获媒体输出权限。

description: Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 更改组件启用状态
trans: 允许应用程序更改是否启用应用程序组件（而不是其自己的组件）。

description: Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale.
name: 更改配置
trans: 允许应用程序修改当前配置，如区域设置。

description: Allows applications to change network connectivity state.
name: 网络状态变化
trans: 允许应用程序更改网络连接状态。

description: Allows applications to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode.
name: Wi-Fi多播模式权限
trans: 允许应用程序进入Wi-Fi多播模式。

description: Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state.
name: 改变WIFI连接状态权限
trans: 允许应用程序更改Wi-Fi连接状态。

description: Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.
name: 清除应用程序缓存
trans: 允许应用程序清除设备上所有已安装应用程序的缓存。

description: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 控制位置更新
trans: 允许从收音机启用/禁用位置更新通知。

description: Old permission for deleting an app's cache files, no longer used, but signals for us to quietly ignore calls instead of throwing an exception.
name: 删除缓存文件
trans: 删除应用程序缓存文件的旧权限，已不再使用，但它指示我们悄悄地忽略调用，而不是抛出异常。

description:
Allows an application to delete packages.
Starting in Build.VERSION_CODES.N, user confirmation is requested when the application deleting the package is not the same application that installed the package.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 删除包
trans: 允许应用程序删除包。

description: Allows applications to RW to diagnostic resources.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 诊断的
trans: 允许应用程序将rw转换为诊断资源。

description: Allows applications to disable the keyguard if it is not secure.
name: 禁用键盘锁
trans: 允许应用程序禁用不安全的键盘保护。

description: Allows an application to retrieve state dump information from system services.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 转储
trans: 允许应用程序从系统服务检索状态转储信息。

description: Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.
name: 程序扩展收缩在状态栏
trans: 允许应用程序展开或折叠状态栏。

description: Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user. Only available when the device is running in manufacturer test mode.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 工厂试验
trans: 作为制造商测试应用程序运行，作为根用户运行。仅在设备以制造商测试模式运行时可用。

description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground.
name: 前台服务
trans: 允许常规应用程序使用service.startForeground。

description:
Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.
Note: Beginning with Android 6.0 (API level 23), if an app shares the signature of the authenticator that manages an account, it does not need "GET_ACCOUNTS" permission to read information about that account. On Android 5.1 and lower, all apps need "GET_ACCOUNTS" permission to read information about any account.
name: 获取手机账户
trans: 允许访问帐户服务中的帐户列表。

description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.
name: 获取帐户特权
trans: 允许访问帐户服务中的帐户列表。

description: Allows an application to find out the space used by any package.
name: 应用包容量大小
trans: 允许应用程序查找任何包使用的空间。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 21.
No longer enforced.
name: 检索正在运行的应用
trans: API级别21中已弃用此常量。

description: This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global search system to access their data. Typically it used when the provider has some permissions protecting it (which global search would not be expected to hold), and added as a read-only permission to the path in the provider where global search queries are performed. This permission can not be held by regular applications; it is used by applications to protect themselves from everyone else besides global search.
name: 全局搜索
trans: 此权限可用于内容提供程序，以允许全局搜索系统访问其数据。通常，当提供程序具有一些保护它的权限（不希望全局搜索保留）时使用，并作为只读权限添加到执行全局搜索查询的提供程序中的路径。常规应用程序不能拥有此权限；应用程序使用此权限保护自己不受全局搜索以外的任何人的攻击。

description: Allows an application to install a location provider into the Location Manager.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 安装位置提供程序
trans: 允许应用程序将位置提供程序安装到位置管理器中。

description: Allows an application to install packages.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 安装程序包
trans: 允许应用程序安装包。

description:
Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.
In Android O (API level 26) and higher, the INSTALL_SHORTCUT broadcast no longer has any effect on your app because it's a private, implicit broadcast. Instead, you should create an app shortcut by using the requestPinShortcut() method from the ShortcutManager class.
name: 安装桌面快捷方式
trans: 允许应用程序在启动程序中安装快捷方式。

description: Allows an instant app to create foreground services.
name: 即时应用前台服务
trans: 允许即时应用创建前台服务。

description: Allows applications to open network sockets.
name: 网络访问权限
trans: 允许应用程序打开网络套接字。

description: Allows an application to call ActivityManager.killBackgroundProcesses(String).
name: 允许应用程式致电权限
trans: 允许应用程序调用ActivityManager.KillBackgroundProcesses（字符串）。

description: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 定位硬件
trans: 允许应用程序在硬件中使用位置功能，如地理围栏API。

description:
Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.
This permission should only be requested by the platform document management app. This permission cannot be granted to third-party apps.
name: 管理文档
trans: 允许应用程序管理对文档的访问，通常作为文档选取器的一部分。

description: Allows a calling application which manages it own calls through the self-managed ConnectionService APIs. See PhoneAccount.CAPABILITY_SELF_MANAGED for more information on the self-managed ConnectionService APIs.
name: 应用自我管理权限
trans: 允许调用应用程序通过自我管理的ConnectionService API管理自己的调用。有关自我管理的ConnectionService API的更多信息，请参阅phoneAccount.capability_self_managed。

level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 主清除

description: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.
level: Not for use by third-party applications due to privacy of media consumption
name: 媒体内容控制
trans: 允许应用程序知道正在播放的内容并控制其播放。

description: Allows an application to modify global audio settings.
name: 修改全局音频设置
trans: 允许应用程序修改全局音频设置。

description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc. Does not include placing calls.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 修改电话状态
trans: 允许修改电话状态-开机、MMI等不包括拨打电话。

description: Allows formatting file systems for removable storage.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 安装格式文件系统
trans: 允许为可移动存储格式化文件系统。

description: Allows mounting and unmounting file systems for removable storage.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 安装卸载文件系统
trans: 允许为可移动存储装载和卸载文件系统。

description: Allows applications to perform I/O operations over NFC.
name: NFC权限
trans: 允许应用程序通过NFC执行I/O操作。

description: Allows applications to receive NFC transaction events.
name: NFC交易事件
trans: 允许应用程序接收NFC事务事件。

description:
Allows an application to collect component usage statistics
Declaring the permission implies intention to use the API and the user of the device can grant permission through the Settings application.
name: 包使用状态
trans: 允许应用程序收集组件使用统计信息

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 15.
This functionality will be removed in the future; please do not use. Allow an application to make its activities persistent.
name: 持续性活动
trans: 该常量在API级别15中已被弃用。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level Q.
Applications should use CallRedirectionService instead of the Intent.ACTION_NEW_OUTGOING_CALL broadcast.
Allows an application to see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether.
name: 监听拨出电话
trans: 此常量在API级别Q中已被弃用。

description: Allows an application to read the user's calendar data.
name: 访问日历
trans: 允许应用程序读取用户的日历数据。

description:
Allows an application to read the user's call log.
Note: If your app uses the READ_CONTACTS permission and both your minSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion values are set to 15 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your targetSdkVersion is 16 or higher.
name: 读取通话记录
trans: 允许应用程序读取用户的呼叫日志。

description: Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.
name: 读取联系人
trans: 允许应用程序读取用户的联系人数据。

description:
Allows an application to read from external storage.
Any app that declares the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is implicitly granted this permission.
This permission is enforced starting in API level 19. Before API level 19, this permission is not enforced and all apps still have access to read from external storage. You can test your app with the permission enforced by enabling Protect USB storage under Developer options in the Settings app on a device running Android 4.1 or higher.
Also starting in API level 19, this permission is not required to read/write files in your application-specific directories returned by Context.getExternalFilesDir(String) and Context.getExternalCacheDir().
Note: If both your minSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.
name: 读取手机存储
trans: 允许应用程序从外部存储中读取。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 16.
The API that used this permission has been removed.
Allows an application to retrieve the current state of keys and switches.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 读取输入状态
trans: 此常量在API级别16中已被弃用。

description: Allows an application to read the low-level system log files.
level: Not for use by third-party applications, because Log entries can contain the user's private information.
name: 读日志
trans: 允许应用程序读取低级系统日志文件。

description: Allows read access to the device's phone number(s). This is a subset of the capabilities granted by READ_PHONE_STATE but is exposed to instant applications.
name: 读取电话号码
trans: 允许读取设备的电话号码。这是read-phone-state授予的功能的一个子集，但它暴露在即时应用程序中。

description:
Allows read only access to phone state, including the phone number of the device, current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any PhoneAccounts registered on the device.
Note: If both your minSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.
name: 获取手机信息
trans: 允许只读访问电话状态，包括设备的电话号码、当前蜂窝网络信息、任何正在进行的呼叫的状态以及设备上注册的任何电话帐户的列表。

description: Allows an application to read SMS messages.
name: 读取短信
trans: 允许应用程序读取短信。

description: Allows applications to read the sync settings.
name: 程序读取同步设置
trans: 允许应用程序读取同步设置。

description: Allows applications to read the sync stats.
name: 程序读取同步状态
trans: 允许应用程序读取同步状态。

description: Allows an application to read voicemails in the system.
name: 读语音信箱
trans: 允许应用程序读取系统中的语音邮件。

description: Required to be able to reboot the device.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 重新启动
trans: 需要重新启动设备。

description: Allows an application to receive the Intent.ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting. If you don't request this permission, you will not receive the broadcast at that time. Though holding this permission does not have any security implications, it can have a negative impact on the user experience by increasing the amount of time it takes the system to start and allowing applications to have themselves running without the user being aware of them. As such, you must explicitly declare your use of this facility to make that visible to the user.
name: 开机广播权限
trans: 允许应用程序接收在系统完成引导后广播的intent.action_boot_completed。如果您不请求此权限，则此时将不会收到广播。虽然保留此权限不存在任何安全隐患，但它会增加系统启动所需的时间，并允许应用程序在用户不知道的情况下运行，从而对用户体验产生负面影响。因此，您必须明确声明您使用此工具的目的是使其对用户可见。

description: Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages.
name: 接收彩信
trans: 允许应用程序监视传入的彩信。

description: Allows an application to receive SMS messages.
name: 接收短信
trans: 允许应用程序接收短信。

description: Allows an application to receive WAP push messages.
name: 接收wap push
trans: 允许应用程序接收WAP推送信息。

description: Allows an application to record audio.
name: 录音
trans: 允许应用程序录制音频。

description: Allows an application to change the Z-order of tasks.
name: 允许程序改变Z轴排列任务
trans: 允许应用程序更改任务的Z顺序。

description: Allows a companion app to run in the background.
name: 允许伴随应用在后台运行权限
trans: 允许在后台运行配套应用程序。

description: Allows a companion app to use data in the background.
name: 允许配套应用在后台使用数据权限
trans: 允许配套应用程序在后台使用数据。

description: Allows an application to request deleting packages. Apps targeting APIs Build.VERSION_CODES.P or greater must hold this permission in order to use Intent.ACTION_UNINSTALL_PACKAGE or PackageInstaller.uninstall(VersionedPackage, IntentSender).
name: 请求卸载应用包权限
trans: 允许应用程序请求删除包。以apis为目标的应用程序build.version_codes.p或更高版本必须持有此权限才能使用intent.action_uninstall_package或packageInstaller.uninstall（versionedPackage、intentsender）。

description: Permission an application must hold in order to use Settings.ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS. This is a normal permission: an app requesting it will always be granted the permission, without the user needing to approve or see it.
name: 请求忽略电池优化
trans: 应用程序必须保留的权限才能使用settings.action_request_ignore_battery_优化。这是一个正常的权限：请求权限的应用程序将始终被授予该权限，而用户无需批准或查看该权限。

description: Allows an application to request installing packages. Apps targeting APIs greater than 25 must hold this permission in order to use Intent.ACTION_INSTALL_PACKAGE.
name: 请求安装应用包权限
trans: 允许应用程序请求安装程序包。目标API大于25的应用程序必须持有此权限才能使用intent.action_install_包。

description: Allows an application to request the screen lock complexity and prompt users to update the screen lock to a certain complexity level.
name: 请求密码复杂性
trans: 允许应用程序请求屏幕锁定复杂性，并提示用户将屏幕锁定更新到特定的复杂性级别。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 15.
The ActivityManager.restartPackage(String) API is no longer supported.
name: 重新启动程序包
trans: 该常量在API级别15中已被弃用。

description: Allows an application (Phone) to send a request to other applications to handle the respond-via-message action during incoming calls.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 通过消息发送响应
trans: 允许应用程序（电话）向其他应用程序发送请求，以便在传入呼叫期间通过消息操作处理响应。

description: Allows an application to send SMS messages.
name: 发送短信
trans: 允许应用程序发送短信。

description: Allows an application to broadcast an Intent to set an alarm for the user.
name: 设置警报权限
trans: 允许应用程序广播为用户设置警报的意图。

description: Allows an application to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 设置始终完成
trans: 允许应用程序控制活动在置于后台时是否立即完成。

description: Modify the global animation scaling factor.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 设置动画比例
trans: 修改全局动画比例因子。

description: Configure an application for debugging.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 设置调试应用程序
trans: 为调试配置应用程序。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 15.
No longer useful, see PackageManager.addPackageToPreferred(String) for details.
name: 设置首选应用程序
trans: 该常量在API级别15中已被弃用。

description: Allows an application to set the maximum number of (not needed) application processes that can be running.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 设置进程限制
trans: 允许应用程序设置可以运行的最大（不需要）应用程序进程数。

description: Allows applications to set the system time.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 设定时间
trans: 允许应用程序设置系统时间。

description: Allows applications to set the system time zone.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 设置时区
trans: 允许应用程序设置系统时区。

description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper.
name: 程序设置壁纸权限
trans: 允许应用程序设置墙纸。

description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper hints.
name: 程序设置壁纸hits权限
trans: 允许应用程序设置墙纸提示。

description: Allow an application to request that a signal be sent to all persistent processes.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 信号持续过程
trans: 允许应用程序请求向所有持久进程发送信号。

description: Allows financial apps to read filtered sms messages.
name: 短信金融交易
trans: 允许财务应用程序读取过滤后的短信。

description: Allows an application to open, close, or disable the status bar and its icons.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 状态栏
trans: 允许应用程序打开、关闭或禁用状态栏及其图标。

description:
Allows an app to create windows using the type WindowManager.LayoutParams.TYPE_APPLICATION_OVERLAY, shown on top of all other apps. Very few apps should use this permission; these windows are intended for system-level interaction with the user.
Note: If the app targets API level 23 or higher, the app user must explicitly grant this permission to the app through a permission management screen. The app requests the user's approval by sending an intent with action Settings.ACTION_MANAGE_OVERLAY_PERMISSION. The app can check whether it has this authorization by calling Settings.canDrawOverlays().
name: 系统弹窗权限
trans: 允许应用程序使用WindowManager.layoutParams.Type_Application_Overlay类型创建窗口，显示在所有其他应用程序之上。很少有应用程序应该使用此权限；这些窗口用于与用户进行系统级交互。

description: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available.
name: 红外发射器权限
trans: 允许使用设备的红外发射器（如果可用）。

description:
Don't use this permission in your app.
This permission is no longer supported.
name: 卸载快捷方式
trans: 不要在应用程序中使用此权限。

description: Allows an application to update device statistics.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 更新设备状态
trans: 允许应用程序更新设备统计信息。

description: Allows an app to use device supported biometric modalities.
name: 使用生物计量学
trans: 允许应用程序使用设备支持的生物识别模式。

description:
This constant was deprecated in API level 28.
Applications should request USE_BIOMETRIC instead
Allows an app to use fingerprint hardware.
name: 使用指纹权限
trans: 此常量在API级别28中已被弃用。

description: Required for apps targeting Build.VERSION_CODES.Q that want to use notification full screen intents.
name: 使用全屏意图
trans: 对于要使用通知全屏意图的面向build.version\codes.q的应用程序是必需的。

description: Allows an application to use SIP service.
name: SIP视频服务
trans: 允许应用程序使用SIP服务。

description: Allows access to the vibrator.
name: 振动设备权限
trans: 允许访问可控震源。

description: Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming.
name: 锁屏后台运行权限
trans: 允许使用PowerManager唤醒锁来防止处理器休眠或屏幕变暗。

description: Allows applications to write the apn settings and read sensitive fields of an existing apn settings like user and password.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 写入APN设置
trans: 允许应用程序写入APN设置并读取现有APN设置的敏感字段，如用户和密码。

description: Allows an application to write the user's calendar data.
name: 写日历
trans: 允许应用程序写入用户的日历数据。

description:
Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's call log data.
Note: If your app uses the WRITE_CONTACTS permission and both your minSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion values are set to 15 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your targetSdkVersion is 16 or higher.
name: 修改通话记录
trans: 允许应用程序写入（但不读取）用户的呼叫日志数据。

description: Allows an application to write the user's contacts data.
name: 写/删除联系人
trans: 允许应用程序写入用户的联系人数据。

description:
Allows an application to write to external storage.
Note: If both your minSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.
Starting in API level 19, this permission is not required to read/write files in your application-specific directories returned by Context.getExternalFilesDir(String) and Context.getExternalCacheDir().
name: 写手机存储
trans: 允许应用程序写入外部存储。

description: Allows an application to modify the Google service map.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 写服务
trans: 允许应用程序修改谷歌服务地图。

description: Allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.
level: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: 写入安全设置
trans: 允许应用程序读取或写入安全系统设置。

description:
Allows an application to read or write the system settings.
Note: If the app targets API level 23 or higher, the app user must explicitly grant this permission to the app through a permission management screen. The app requests the user's approval by sending an intent with action Settings.ACTION_MANAGE_WRITE_SETTINGS. The app can check whether it has this authorization by calling Settings.System.canWrite().
name: 写入设置
trans: 允许应用程序读取或写入系统设置。

description: Allows applications to write the sync settings.
name: 程序写入同步设置
trans: 允许应用程序写入同步设置。

description: Allows an application to modify and remove existing voicemails in the system.
name: 写语音信箱
trans: 允许应用程序修改和删除系统中现有的语音邮件。
